negotiator.tournament

Class TournamentGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.tournament.TournamentGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.util.List<NegotiationParty>>

    public class TournamentGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.util.List<NegotiationParty>>
    This class will generate the party lists for each negotiation in the tournament. The reason for this generator is that the number of parties can become quite large, which means that at some point, we are unable to enumerate them all. This class will only give the next list parties to overcome that limitation.

        Generate the list of parties in the given session

        profileRepItems - The repository items for profiles

        mediatorProfileRepItem - The mediator repository profile (or null)
        deadlines - The deadlines used fot this session
